trans-unit.source: Represents a single command line tool switch.
trans-unit.target: 表示单个命令行工具开关。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CommandLineToolSwitch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CommandLineToolSwitch"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CommandLineToolSwitch"></xref> to hold the name, tool, attributes, dependent switches, and values..
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Xaml.CommandLineToolSwitch"></xref>来保存名称、 工具、 属性，依赖交换机和值...

trans-unit.source: The type of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 交换机的类型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether multiple values are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否允许多个值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if multiple values are allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果允许多个值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether arguments are required in the command line tool switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否在命令行工具交换机需要自变量。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if arguments are required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果参数是必需的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the arguments required for the command line tool switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所需的命令行工具开关的自变量。

trans-unit.source: The arguments required for the command line tool switch.
trans-unit.target: 有关命令行工具开关所需的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Boolean value of the command line switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置命令行开关的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value of the command line switch.
trans-unit.target: 命令行开关的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the single command line tool switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单个命令行工具交换机的说明。

trans-unit.source: The description of the single command line tool switch.
trans-unit.target: 单个命令行工具交换机的说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该交换机的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 交换机的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fallback parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的回退参数。

trans-unit.source: The fallback parameter.
trans-unit.target: 回退的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suffix to use when the switch is false or negated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用交换机时 false 或求反后的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use when the switch is false or negated.
trans-unit.target: 要使用交换机时 false 或求反后的后缀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the command line tool switch in the command line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在命令行中包含的命令行工具开关。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if to include the command line tool switch in the command line; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果，要包括在命令行中; 中的命令行工具开关否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the switch is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该交换机是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the switch is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果该交换机是否有效，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的交换机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 交换机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for integer type switches.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置整数类型开关的值。

trans-unit.source: The value for integer type switches.
trans-unit.target: 整数类型开关值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the overrides for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取为交换机的替代。

trans-unit.source: The overrides for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 开关的重写。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parents for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取为交换机的父级。

trans-unit.source: The parents for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 交换机的父级。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the switch is required.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否交换机是必需的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> If the switch is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果该交换机是必需的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the reverse switch text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的反向转换文本。

trans-unit.source: The reverse switch text.
trans-unit.target: 反向转换文本中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the switch is reversible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否该交换机是可还原。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the switch is reversible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果开关已可逆;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the separator between the switch and its arguments.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对开关以及其自变量之间的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The separator between the switch and its arguments.
trans-unit.target: 对开关以及其自变量之间的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of strings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字符串的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of strings.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置开关的值。

trans-unit.source: The value for the switch.
trans-unit.target: 开关的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of task items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的任务项的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of task items.
trans-unit.target: 任务项的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suffix to use when the switch is true.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要切换为 true 时使用的后缀。

trans-unit.source: The suffix to use when the switch is true.
trans-unit.target: 要使用交换机为 true 时的后缀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类型的交换机。

trans-unit.source: The type of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 交换机的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置开关的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the switch.
trans-unit.target: 开关的值。
